about_the_game:
GROCHÓW AND BEYOND

In the demo version of Hoodies Squad: Alcoholypse, you'll be transported to Grochów, a district of Warsaw, where a mysterious force disrupts the peace of the residents, forcing them to think all too soberly. In this demo, you'll have the chance to explore a fragment of this bizarre reality, solving puzzles and uncovering secrets on a limited map, with restricted gameplay time and access to fewer mechanics.

COMBAT

During the demo, you’ll explore selected locations, from Grochów apartment blocks to dark corners. You’ll encounter a variety of puzzles and snippets of the story, giving you a glimpse of the full, unique narrative.

COLORFUL CHARACTERS

Meet a few colorful characters who will either help or hinder your mission. The demo introduces you to some of these characters, showcasing the diverse cast of this unusual world.

ALCOHOLYPSE

Can you restore normalcy to Grochów before time runs out? The demo lets you experience part of the challenges and the humorous adventure that awaits you in the full game. It’s time to find out what the Alcoholypse is all about!

short_description: In Grochów, something strange is causing the residents to behave abnormally. Three inseparable buddies must restore balance by discovering the causes of this confusion and heading deep into the mysterious Alcoholypse demo. Will they succeed in restoring normalcy before the neighborhood collapses?
